attributes.additional_details:
British Steel is very top heavy. There are too many managers and head engineers not worth the pay they are given. We know very well that governments in other countries such as China India America etc back their businesses. 
This leaves us with the question:
Why does UK Government not do the same and support British businesses. The country cannot survive forever by financial services in London alone. The country needs manufacturing and farming to be strong and sustainable for future generations.
attributes.background:
British Government is constantly making excuses as to why they cannot support British Businesses.  At a time when British steel needs just £30million pounds to stay afloat. 
Why can this government not back British Steel, only a few years ago RBS, Lloyd's were bailed out vast amounts of money.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to support British Businesses
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might want to sign this petition on British Steel

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/262184
